Name: Pigottosan
Title: DaveP
Content: Awesome love this charger and the monitoring of the battery is just a bonus. Get 1 now!

Name: iKendall
Title: Great GPS based car locator
Content:
I don't review apps often. 

This application and the charger itself are amazing products. I only open the app when I need to find my car. It always has the location stored. I never have to think about it when I park my car. It just works. 

Application interface is fantastic and the charges my iPad with no problem.

I bought assuming it was going to be another gimmicky accessory. Was I wrong. I'd buy another but I only have one car :)

Name: 大大的几把
Title: 居然不支持中文
Content: 那干嘛拿到中国区来发行？垃圾！

Name: hakau
Title: richtig gut ...
Content:
Ich benutze ZUS jetzt seit ca. 2 Monaten und bin sehr zufrieden. Man kann gleichzeitig zwei Geräte aufladen, für die das Gerät die jeweils optimale Ladespannung herstellt (bei mir iPhone und Kindle oder iPad). Wenn Bluetooth eingeschaltet ist, sendet das Ladegrät die genauen Standortdaten automatisch an die App, was wiederum bedeutet, dass man sein Auto auch wiederfindet, wenn man sich verlaufen hat.
Die Autobatterie-Anzeige habe ich noch nicht gebraucht und weiß deshalb nicht wie wichtig sie wirklich ist.
Wenn man ein Ladekabel fürs Auto sucht und nichts gegen einen Zusatznutzen hat: Klare Kaufempfehlung.

Name: PaulJBiddulph
Title: The very best
Content: This little gismo works so well it's frightening.  As long as you have blue tooth this will find your car!  Unbelievably it also tells me the uk car us 1486 miles away when we are in Spain!  Buy it and enjoy

Name: AviElbaz2
Title: Just untrustworthy !
Content:
The app hangs and crashes on daily basis. Won't keep the current parking spot but will keep the past one. 
When start driving the app will not connect to the zus charger and will show me as I am getting away from the car when I'm actually driving the car. 
Simply a disappointment!!

Name: Akp kasun
Title: it is very good
Content: it is very good product.i love it.

Name: MagicJ29
Title: 一直閃退
Content: 這版本一直閃退，根本用不了！快快修復

Name: ML8766
Title: Love it!
Content: Solid well designed, cool looking device and well written app. The live battery feature is a feature I didn't expect and now can't sling without. Fast charging and location services always work. Well worth the money. A must have!

Name: st.burrito
Title: Outstanding
Content: Great app, great product, especially when you're on vacation or in unfamiliar territory.

Name: tjhart1366
Title: ZUS
Content: Best device and application, functions seemlessly.

Name: _crisradu
Title: Perfect!
Content: It does what you'd expect from it and it does it flawlessly!!!

Name: Wegoego
Title: Love ZUS
Content:
I rarely write reviews because I am often not that impressed with apps/ gadgets and their claims.   However, I love ZUS. I am of the age where it is not uncommon to forget where I parked at. ZUS directs me to my car quickly. My car was totaled recently and one thing I was sure to grab out of my old one was my ZUS. it soon came in handy when I had to take my new car in for an after market add on. I could not find my car where they told me it was parked. Looked at my ZUS on my phone and found it in a different area in seconds. 

I also love the two charging ports and cables for fast phone charging. The cables are well made. I love ZUS!

Name: erchirag
Title: Awesome
Content: I really like ZUS charger but i miss apple watch app for ZUS charger. Hope you can release in next version.

Name: skotyman
Title: Spotty after last update
Content: Suddenly got spotty on marking my parking ahter last update. Used to work great!

Name: rclay24
Title: Battery Hog
Content: Reasonably handy app but a huge battery hog. Noticed a marked decrease in battery life after installation. I just checked and it represents 55% of my battery usage in last day. Do not let it run in background.

Name: lauwersp
Title: Really like this product
Content: Only thing I'd love is an Apple Watch app to go along with this product. Every time I get the timer notification on my watch I have to switch to the phone to actually set a timer. Seems a good candidate for a watch app.
